How to Buy Bitcoin Fast

by Jordan Tuwiner

In Bitcoin's early days, you couldn't buy bitcoin without sending money to a different country. Competition in the space has increased, and many companies can deliver your bitcoin within a few hours and even instantly.

The companies listed below offer the fastest ways to buy bitcoin. One of the quickest ways to buy bitcoin in most countries is via cash deposit. Some of the companies below may require an initial verification before buying bitcoin becomes instant or quick. The availability of each company below may vary by country.

Coinbase Buy Bitcoin

Coinbase lets you buy bitcoin with a connected bank account via ACH bank transfer. The bitcoin bought in your first purchase will only be available to you after five days. However, if you add a credit card to your account all purchases after your initial purchase will have your bitcoin delivered instantly. Coinbase is available in the United States and most of Europe.

Buy Bitcoin

Circle Buy Bitcoin

Circle lets you buy bitcoin with a credit card, debit card, or ACH bank transfer. Purchases of bitcoin made with a debit card are available instantly. Circle is currently only available in the United States.

Buy Bitcoin

BitQuick Buy Bitcoin

BitQuick's goal is to make buying bitcoin fast and easy. Bitcoin purchases made with cash deposit are usually delivered within two hours, and in many cases in under an hour. BitQuick can be used in the United States and Europe.

Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins lets customers pay with a number of payment methods. Bitcoin purchased with cash deposit is usually delivered within a few hours. Local Bitcoins works in every country, but its reliability depends on the liquidity in your location.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io lets you buy bitcoin with a credit card, ACH bank transfer, or SEPA transfer. Purchases made with a credit card give you access to your bitcoin immediately. CEX.io works in the United States, Europe, and some countries in South America.

Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX lets you buy bitcoin with cash at a number of stores across the United States. Bitcoin is usually delivered within an hour of payment, and sometimes within 15 minutes.

Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin lets you buy bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit card in 30 U.S. states. Your bitcoin will be delivered instantly. Available in Alabama, Arizona, Arkansas, American Samoa, Connecticut, Washington D.C., Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, New Mexico, North Dakota, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Texas, Wake Island, West Virginia, and Wyoming.

Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins works like BitQuick, and lets you buy bitcoin with cash deposit. Your bitcoin will be delivered shortly after the seller verifies that the payment was received. Available in the United States only.

Buy Bitcoin

As Bitcoin gains new users and its liquidity increases, buying bitcoin will only become a faster and easier process. If none of the options listed above work for you, use our country index to find more places to buy bitcoin in your area.
